transcript:
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan Vijay sir good afternoon.
Executive: Haan good afternoon. 
Customer: Ji Praveen bol raha hu India Mart se.
Executive: Haan boliye sir. 
Customer: Keh raha tha ki wo jo trust seal ka naam wala bol rahe the aap wo maine bheja tha wo varsa Vijay sunan sunavne ho gaya hai.
Executive: Achcha, theek hai.
Customer: Dekha tha aapne?
Executive: Nahi abhi dekha nahi main baahar hu thoda.
Customer: Haan ek baar whatsapp pe dobara bhej de raha hu.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Naam maine update karwa diya theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir. 
Customer: Abhi free nahi hai aap?
Executive: Nahi nahi baahar baitha hu.
Customer: Achcha achcha ye update ho gaya to iske regarding main sanction close kar de raha hu theek hai?
Executive: Theek hai. 
Customer: Main bhej raha hu haan update karke.
summary:
Concerns:

- Trust seal name update not yet seen.



Resolution:

- Customer will resend the updated name via WhatsApp.

- Sanction will be closed regarding the update.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved. Customer will resend the updated name via WhatsApp.

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

trust seal, name update, whatsapp
